simula.compiler.statement

Class ConnectionStatement

  • java.lang.Object
    • simula.compiler.SyntaxClass
      • simula.compiler.statement.Statement
        • simula.compiler.statement.ConnectionStatement

  • public class ConnectionStatement
extends Statement
    Connection Statement. 
     
 Syntax:
 
 connection-statement = INSPECT object-expression  connection-part [ OTHERWISE statement ]
                connection-part = DO statement | selective-part
                        selective-part = { WHEN  DO  }
    Author:
    Øystein Myhre Andersen
